verses.verse: Ya`akov <S%G2385><s%>, a servant <S%G1401><s%> of 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> of the YY <S%G2962><s%> Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> Moshiach <S%G5547><s%>, to the twelve <S%G1427><s%> tribes <S%G5443><s%> which <S%G1722><s%> are scattered abroad <S%G1290><s%>, greeting <S%G5463><s%> <S%G5721><s%>.

My <S%G3450><s%> brethren <S%G80><s%>, count it <S%G2233><s%> <S%G5662><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> joy <S%G5479><s%> when <S%G3752><s%> ye fall <S%G4045><s%> <S%G5632><s%> into divers <S%G4164><s%> temptations <S%G3986><s%>;
Knowing <S%G1097><s%> <S%G5723><s%> this, that <S%G3754><s%> the trying <S%G1383><s%> of your <S%G5216><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%> worketh <S%G2716><s%> <S%G5736><s%> patience <S%G5281><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> let <S%G2192><s%> patience <S%G5281><s%> have <S%G2192><s%> <S%G5720><s%> her perfect <S%G5046><s%> work <S%G2041><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> ye may be <S%G5600><s%> <S%G5753><s%> perfect <S%G5046><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> entire <S%G3648><s%>, wanting <S%G3007><s%> <S%G5746><s%> nothing <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3367><s%>.

<S%G1161><s%> If any <S%G1536><s%> of you <S%G5216><s%> lack <S%G3007><s%> <S%G5743><s%> wisdom <S%G4678><s%>, let him ask <S%G154><s%> <S%G5720><s%> of <S%G3844><s%> 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%>, that giveth <S%G1325><s%> <S%G5723><s%> to all <S%G3956><s%> men liberally <S%G574><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> upbraideth <S%G3679><s%> <S%G5723><s%> not <S%G3361><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> it shall be given <S%G1325><s%> <S%G5701><s%> him <S%G846><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> let him ask <S%G154><s%> <S%G5720><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%>, nothing <S%G3367><s%> wavering <S%G1252><s%> <S%G5734><s%>. For <S%G1063><s%> he that wavereth <S%G1252><s%> <S%G5734><s%> is like <S%G1503><s%> <S%G5758><s%> a wave <S%G2830><s%> of the sea <S%G2281><s%> driven with the wind <S%G416><s%> <S%G5746><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> tossed <S%G4494><s%> <S%G5746><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> let <S%G3633><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> that <S%G1565><s%> man <S%G444><s%> think <S%G3633><s%> <S%G5737><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> he shall receive <S%G2983><s%> <S%G5695><s%> any thing <S%G5100><s%> of <S%G3844><s%> the YY <S%G2962><s%>.
A double minded <S%G1374><s%> man <S%G435><s%> is unstable <S%G182><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> his <S%G846><s%> ways <S%G3598><s%>.
<S%G1161><s%> Let <S%G2744><s%> the brother <S%G80><s%> of low degree <S%G5011><s%> rejoice <S%G2744><s%> <S%G5737><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> that he <S%G846><s%> is exalted <S%G5311><s%>:

But <S%G1161><s%> the rich <S%G4145><s%>, in <S%G1722><s%> that he <S%G846><s%> is made low <S%G5014><s%>: because <S%G3754><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> the flower <S%G438><s%> of the grass <S%G5528><s%> he shall pass away <S%G3928><s%> <S%G5695><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> the sun <S%G2246><s%> is no sooner risen <S%G393><s%> <S%G5656><s%> with <S%G4862><s%> a burning heat <S%G2742><s%>, but <S%G2532><s%> it withereth <S%G3583><s%> <S%G5656><s%> the grass <S%G5528><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the flower <S%G438><s%> thereof <S%G846><s%> falleth <S%G1601><s%> <S%G5627><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the grace <S%G2143><s%> of the fashion <S%G4383><s%> of it <S%G846><s%> perisheth <S%G622><s%> <S%G5639><s%>: so <S%G3779><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> shall <S%G3133><s%> the rich man <S%G4145><s%> fade away <S%G3133><s%> <S%G5701><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> his <S%G846><s%> ways <S%G4197><s%>.

Blessed <S%G3107><s%> is the man <S%G435><s%> that <S%G3739><s%> endureth <S%G5278><s%> <S%G5719><s%> temptation <S%G3986><s%>: for <S%G3754><s%> when he is tried <S%G1384><s%> <S%G1096><s%> <S%G5637><s%>, he shall receive <S%G2983><s%> <S%G5695><s%> the crown <S%G4735><s%> of life <S%G2222><s%>, which <S%G3739><s%> the YY <S%G2962><s%> hath promised <S%G1861><s%> <S%G5662><s%> to them that love <S%G25><s%> <S%G5723><s%> him <S%G846><s%>.

Let <S%G3004><s%> no man <S%G3367><s%> say <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5720><s%> when he is tempted <S%G3985><s%> <S%G5746><s%>, <S%G3754><s%> I am tempted <S%G3985><s%> <S%G5743><s%> of <S%G575><s%> 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%> cannot be tempted <S%G551><s%> <S%G2076><s%> <S%G5748><s%> with evil <S%G2556><s%>, neither <S%G1161><s%> tempteth <S%G3985><s%> he <S%G846><s%> <S%G3985><s%> <S%G5719><s%> any man <S%G3762><s%>:

But <S%G1161><s%> every man <S%G1538><s%> is tempted <S%G3985><s%> <S%G5743><s%>, when he is drawn away <S%G1828><s%> <S%G5746><s%> of <S%G5259><s%> his own <S%G2398><s%> lust <S%G1939><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> enticed <S%G1185><s%> <S%G5746><s%>.

Then <S%G1534><s%> when lust <S%G1939><s%> hath conceived <S%G4815><s%> <S%G5631><s%>, it bringeth forth <S%G5088><s%> <S%G5719><s%> sin <S%G266><s%>: and <S%G1161><s%> sin <S%G266><s%>, when it is finished <S%G658><s%> <S%G5685><s%>, bringeth forth <S%G616><s%> <S%G5719><s%> death <S%G2288><s%>.
Do <S%G4105><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> err <S%G4105><s%> <S%G5744><s%>, my <S%G3450><s%> beloved <S%G27><s%> brethren <S%G80><s%>.

Havahry <S%G3956><s%> good <S%G18><s%> gift <S%G1394><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> perfect <S%G5046><s%> gift <S%G1434><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> <S%G5748><s%> from above <S%G509><s%>, and cometh down <S%G2597><s%> <S%G5723><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the Father <S%G3962><s%> of lights <S%G5457><s%>, with <S%G3844><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> is <S%G1762><s%> <S%G5748><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> variableness <S%G3883><s%>, neither <S%G2228><s%> shadow <S%G644><s%> of turning <S%G5157><s%>.

Of his own will <S%G1014><s%> <S%G5679><s%> begat he <S%G616><s%> <S%G5656><s%> us <S%G2248><s%> with the word <S%G3056><s%> of truth <S%G225><s%>, that <S%G1519><s%> we <S%G2248><s%> should be <S%G1511><s%> <S%G5750><s%> a kind <S%G5100><s%> of firstfruits <S%G536><s%> of his <S%G846><s%> creatures <S%G2938><s%>.
For <S%G1063><s%> the wrath <S%G3709><s%> of man <S%G435><s%> worketh <S%G2716><s%> <S%G5736><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> the righteousness <S%G1343><s%> of 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%>.

Wherefore <S%G1352><s%> lay apart <S%G659><s%> <S%G5642><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> filthiness <S%G4507><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> superfluity <S%G4050><s%> of naughtiness <S%G2549><s%>, and receive <S%G1209><s%> <S%G5663><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> meekness <S%G4240><s%> the engrafted <S%G1721><s%> word <S%G3056><s%>, which <S%G3588><s%> is able <S%G1410><s%> <S%G5740><s%> to save <S%G4982><s%> <S%G5658><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> souls <S%G5590><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> be ye <S%G1096><s%> <S%G5737><s%> doers <S%G4163><s%> of the word <S%G3056><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> hearers <S%G202><s%> only <S%G3440><s%>, deceiving <S%G3884><s%> <S%G5740><s%> your own selves <S%G1438><s%>.

For <S%G3754><s%> if any <S%G1536><s%> be <S%G2076><s%> <S%G5748><s%> a hearer <S%G202><s%> of the word <S%G3056><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> a doer <S%G4163><s%>, he <S%G3778><s%> is like <S%G1503><s%> <S%G5758><s%> unto a man <S%G435><s%> beholding <S%G2657><s%> <S%G5723><s%> his <S%G846><s%> natural <S%G1078><s%> face <S%G4383><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> a glass <S%G2072><s%>:

For <S%G1063><s%> he beholdeth <S%G2657><s%> <S%G5656><s%> himself <S%G1438><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> goeth his way <S%G565><s%> <S%G5754><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> straightway <S%G2112><s%> forgetteth <S%G1950><s%> <S%G5633><s%> what manner of man <S%G3697><s%> he was <S%G2258><s%> <S%G5713><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> whoso looketh <S%G3879><s%> <S%G5660><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the perfect <S%G5046><s%> Torah <S%G3551><s%> of liberty <S%G1657><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> continueth <S%G3887><s%> <S%G5660><s%> therein, he <S%G3778><s%> being <S%G1096><s%> <S%G5637><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> a forgetful <S%G1953><s%> hearer <S%G202><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> a doer <S%G4163><s%> of the work <S%G2041><s%>, this man <S%G3778><s%> shall be <S%G2071><s%> <S%G5704><s%> blessed <S%G3107><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> his <S%G846><s%> deed <S%G4162><s%>.

If any man <S%G1536><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> you <S%G5213><s%> seem <S%G1380><s%> <S%G5719><s%> to be <S%G1511><s%> <S%G5750><s%> religious <S%G2357><s%>, and bridleth <S%G5468><s%> <S%G5723><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> his <S%G846><s%> tongue <S%G1100><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> deceiveth <S%G538><s%> <S%G5723><s%> his own <S%G846><s%> heart <S%G2588><s%>, this man's <S%G5127><s%> religion <S%G2356><s%> is vain <S%G3152><s%>.

Pure <S%G2513><s%> religion <S%G2356><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> undefiled <S%G283><s%> before <S%G3844><s%> 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the Father <S%G3962><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> <S%G5748><s%> this <S%G3778><s%>, To visit <S%G1980><s%> <S%G5738><s%> the fatherless <S%G3737><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> widows <S%G5503><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> their <S%G846><s%> affliction <S%G2347><s%>, and to keep <S%G5083><s%> <S%G5721><s%> himself <S%G1438><s%> unspotted <S%G784><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the world <S%G2889><s%>.
